enumerations.name: AclScopeEnum
enumerations.note: This enumerator represents the scope of a definition in context of access control. Aggregated by AclObjectSet.aclScope, AclPermission.aclScope

literals.name: dependant
literals.description:
This specifies that the AclPermission applies to dependant (in particular referenced) operations / objects as well. Note that this includes the descendant ones.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0

literals.name: descendant
literals.description:
This specifies that the AclPermission applies to descendant operations / objects as well.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

literals.name: explicit
literals.description:
This is indicates that the AclPermission applies to explicit objects / operations only.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=2
